name: F. Freddy Day (Horror Game)
description:
This is a Horror Game about Funtime Freddy going through 5 different stages of Nightmares, and Horror.

Funtime Freddy is made to be a YouTube Gamer, but actively fails as he is kidnapped by these people that want him to play "their" Game. But he eventually returns back Home.

Chapter 1: Orange Roulette

Chapter 2: Kill it with Fire
